sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Bison-&bison-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: rm, cp, mkdir, ls, chmod, mv, ln gcc: cc grep: grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, sleep textutils: tr, cat
